SEARCH
Package com.conductor.core.service

Class EventApplicationService

java.lang.Object
com.conductor.core.service.EventApplicationService
@Service public class EventApplicationService extends Object
Service layer for handling event applications (reservations).

This service provides methods for participants to apply to events, submit application forms, and manage application lifecycle operations (approve, reject, cancel, comment). It interacts with repositories and delegates core business logic to ApplicationManager.

Typical workflow:

  • Users apply for an event that requires an application.
  • Operators approve or reject submitted applications.
  • Approved applications may result in ticket issuance.

  • Method Details

    • apply

      @Transactional public String apply(User user, String eventExternalId, String formResponse)
      Apply for a given event.

      This validates that the event exists and currently accepts applications. Verifies form response and then finally registers a new application for the user.

      Parameters:
      eventExternalId - external identifier of the event
      formResponse - response to the form associated with the event
      Returns:
      external identifier of the newly created application
      Throws:
      EventNotFoundException - if the event does not exist
      IllegalArgumentException - either arguments are invalid input: '{@code null or form response is in-valid @throws ApplicationRequestFailedException This exception can be thrown for the following resaons:- <p> <ul> <li>if an application for this event already exists.</li> <li>If the event does not accept or no longer accepts applications.</li> <li>If a database operations failed..</li> </ul> </p>'

    • getEventForm

      @Transactional public String getEventForm(String eventExternalId)
      Get an event's form by its external identifier
      Parameters:
      eventExternalId - external id of the target event
      Returns:
      Form of the event in String
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if argument is null
      EventNotFoundException - if the event is not found.

    • approveEventApplication

      @Transactional public void approveEventApplication(User approvedBy, String applicationExternalId)
      Approve an application for an event. This grants a ticket to the user that submitted the application a ticket.
      Parameters:
      applicationExternalId - external identifier of the application
      Throws:
      ApplicationNotFound - if the application cannot be found
      IllegalArgumentException - if application external id is null
      ApplicationRequestFailedException - for all other exceptions cause due to database operations failure.

    • cancelEventApplication

      @Transactional public void cancelEventApplication(String applicationExternalId)
      Cancel an application for an event.
      Parameters:
      applicationExternalId - external identifier of the application
      Throws:
      ApplicationNotFound - if the application cannot be found
      ApplicationRequestFailedException - for all other exceptions cause due to database operations failure.

    • rejectEventApplication

      @Transactional public void rejectEventApplication(User user, String applicationExternalId, String reason)
      Reject an application for an event with a reason.
      Parameters:
      applicationExternalId - external identifier of the application
      reason - reason for rejection
      Throws:
      ApplicationNotFound - if the application cannot be found
      ApplicationRequestFailedException - for all other exceptions cause due to database operations failure.
